Reviews.Title: Great pictures, great value.
Reviews.Author: Goodman916
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera on sale with reservations. The price of the camera droppedand the lower price seemed to indicate a lack of confidence or something worse. Afterusing the camera and viewing its pictures. I am very happy with the results. I am gladI purchased this camera at a good price.Pros-CostSizeFeaturesPIcture QualityCons- Low light pictures are average at best.Overall  I would highly recommend the camera especially to persons seekingevery day pictures. The amount of features on this camera makes it a bargain.Even with the low light images just being fair. I would not hesitate to purchasethis camera again.

Reviews.Title: Amazing price.
Reviews.Author: Stephen Mathews
Reviews.Content: The Samsung ST201 is a good camera for a great price.  I was skeptical at first that I wouldn't like the images when ordered it since I am used to my DSLR's image quality, but that was all put to rest when I actually got this camera in my hand.  This camera is one of the most under-marketed camera's available. I would have never found it if I hadn't seen it listed on Woot.com.  Granted, this camera doesn't measure up to up to that of a DSLR, but it is still quite respectable.  The build quality is above average, and so are the images.  I'm a very negative person, but I only have two cons. 1) The image quality with a high depth of field lease some to be desired. 2) Not the best of images in low light, which is to be expected coming from a DSLR user.  3)  It uses micro SD cards which is a con for me seeing as I already have a bunch of money invested in normal SD cards. Although, it doesn't bug me too much because it does help reduce the size of the camera and, when I decide to change cameras again, I can always throw the Micro SD in my phone.  All in all, it is a very nice camera for a great deal. Especially since I picked it up for 50 dollars, but at standard price it still would be a great choice.  I like the image quality. I bought it because I don't always want to be carrying my DSLR around with me and this is very portable.

Reviews.Title: More than I thought
Reviews.Author: Ryan Fordan
Reviews.Content: Great camera and even a better price!!!  So many features, I would highly recommend this camera for the price point.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera !
Reviews.Author: Donna Shaw
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, the price was $20 cheaper than Walmart & on top of that it had all the aspects that I was looking for : rechargeable battery, 10X zoom ,16 pixcels, great for an inexpencive camera , easy to use , I received in it in just 4 days ,very pleased !

Reviews.Title: It gets the job done
Reviews.Author: Nulani
Reviews.Content: Not a fancy camera, but easy to operate.  The photos are fine.  The price is right.  I'm pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: The memory don't SDCH only micro SD
Reviews.Author: Roxana
Reviews.Content: The camara is Ok. But in descripcion say accept SDCH and a buy this memory, that don't put them...DONT BUY SDHC FOR THIS CAM.!

Reviews.Title: Bought for my wife for christmas.
Reviews.Author: Reichly
Reviews.Content: She loves it and it works so much faster than here old canon poc. Nice size to fin in pockets and takes great pics.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted
Reviews.Author: Barb
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use and takes great pictures.  I looked a long time and this camera meets all my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camara for the money
Reviews.Author: Steven R. Murray
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  Talked my sister in law into buying one too.  Great optical zoom (16mp) and loads of features for a point and shoot.  Far easier to carry around than my Canon SLR.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quallity
Reviews.Author: HOANA
Reviews.Content: You can not get more features in a miniature camera for this little money. Absolutely top quality, easy to use. What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Awesome Buy!
Reviews.Author: Josiah Jackson
Reviews.Content: Great still if your looking for a camera that does it all .With high megapixels and panoramic, i honestly couldn't ask for more.

Reviews.Title: This is an awesome camera.
Reviews.Author: James W. Jacobs
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera strictly to take pictures on my current "vacation" and so far it has been awesome!! This camera has awesome picture quality as well.

Reviews.Title: Great bargin
Reviews.Author: Joe  Beach
Reviews.Content: Got tired of the nikon's and olympia's that keep breaking. This one's got more features than I need but it's all a bonus. good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Good...
Reviews.Author: Anita Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: The delivery was excellent, received on March 8.  I'm satisfied with the buy, but I wished I had brought a bundle because I'm still searching for a 16GB memory card, shipping was very expensive.

Reviews.Title: Be aware !
Reviews.Author: Khan
Reviews.Content: Overall this camera is good but it's mic is not very powerful, resulting in low voice videos. One more thing, it will not record a video for more than 20 minutes at a time

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung St201 16.1mp 10x Zoom 3.0" lcd HD Digital Camera Black
